# firstPickup

**Instance Property**

The first time the user picked up the device during the activity segment.

## Declaration

```swift
var firstPickup: Date?
```

## Discussion

This value may be `nil` if the device was never picked up during [doc://com.apple.DeviceActivity/documentation/DeviceActivity/DeviceActivityData/ActivitySegment/dateInterval].
title: firstPickup
